text: Thomas Albert Parker (22 November 1906 – 11 November 1964) was an English footballer. His regular position was at centre-half. He was born in Eccles, Lancashire. He played for Manchester United, Bristol City, Carlisle United and Stalybridge Celtic. ==External links== *Profile at StretfordEnd.co.uk *Profile at MUFCInfo.com Category:1907 births Category:1964 deaths Category:People from Eccles, Greater Manchester Category:English footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Manchester United F.C. players Category:Bristol City F.C. players Category:Carlisle United F.C. players Category:Stalybridge Celtic F.C. players
title: Thomas Parker (footballer)
